meanings.definition: A small piece of tasty food.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed every tidbit of the delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: She savored each tidbit of the flavorful dish.
meanings.sent3: The tidbit of cheese made the mouse very happy.
meanings.sent4: The tidbit of information was like a hidden gem.
meanings.sent5: The tidbit of chocolate melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A small and particularly interesting item of gossip or information.
meanings.sent1: The tidbit about the celebrity's secret wedding spread quickly.
meanings.sent2: He shared a juicy tidbit about the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: The tidbit of news made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: That tidbit of gossip was like a bombshell!
meanings.sent5: The tidbit of information was too intriguing to ignore.
